snippet.title: DEPRISION | OFFICIAL TEASER
snippet.description:
In this Official Teaser, we offer a brief glimpse of how the title will look in terms of Story, Narrative, Audio, and Gameplay. We showcase the title in a Beta of Build 2023, providing a sneak peek into the gameplay in a beta version of the game. Some snippets from both the "Dream" and "Prologue" chapters are shown, revealing environments and the camera movement system. In this case, we utilize a Bodycam with a fisheye lens and head movement system, along with other features that will be available on our website.

Find DEPRISION on:

Steam: https://store.steampowered.com/app/1804730/DEPRISION/
Epic Games Store: https://store.epicgames.com/en-US/p/deprision-1dc41e
Official website: https://deprisiongame.com/
X (formerly known as Twitter): https://twitter.com/deprisiongame

Find AleProgramadorStudios on: 

lnk.bio: https://lnk.bio/AleProgramadorStudios
LinkedIn: https://www.linkedin.com/company/aleprogramadorstudios/
X (formerly known as Twitter): https://twitter.com/AleGamesStudios
Twitch: https://www.twitch.tv/aleprogramadorstudios
TikTok: https://www.tiktok.com/@aleprogramadorstudiossrl
YouTube: https://www.youtube.com/@AleProgramadorStudiosSRL/featured
Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/alegamesstudiossrl/

Release date: Q4 2025.
